game.name: Vampires of the 99th Night
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Blood is your currency, your HP, and your weapon. Reclaim your legacy in this Gothic Action-Roguelike with Base Building elements. Master physics minigames to strike deals, capture monsters in the heat of combat, and build a sprawling castle powered by the visceral fluids of your enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Blood is your currency, your HP, and your weapon. Reclaim your legacy in this Gothic Action-Roguelike with Base Building elements. Master physics minigames to strike deals, capture monsters in the heat of combat, and build a sprawling castle powered by the visceral fluids of your enemies.
